title: The Glimmering Cache
trigger_condition: After resting in a ruined building for at least 6 hours
description: A faint, rhythmic humming awakens you. A soft blue light pulses from a crack in the floorboards, revealing a hidden, pre-war storage container. It seems intact, but the hum suggests its power source is still active, and possibly unstable.

choices.option: Force the container open with a crowbar.
choices.consequence: Gain 3-5 random high-quality supplies (meds, ammo, tech parts), but the unstable power core ruptures, dealing 15 damage to you and attracting nearby Scavengers.

choices.option: Attempt to carefully disarm the power source first.
choices.consequence: Requires a Tech skill check (moderate). Success: Safely retrieve all contents (5-7 supplies) and a unique energy cell. Failure: The core overloads, destroying the loot and dealing 10 damage.
Avoid all risk. The humming fades after you depart. Gain nothing, but also avoid danger.

duration: Until the container is opened or you leave the area
